scripts.pip-compile: pip install -U pip setuptools pip-tools && pip-compile requirements/dev.in && pip-sync requirements/dev.txt && pip-compile requirements/deploy.in && safety check
scripts.pip-compile-upgrade: pip install -U pip setuptools pip-tools && pip-compile pip-compile requirements/dev.in --upgrade && pip-sync requirements/dev.txt && pip-compile requirements/deploy.in --upgrade && safety check
